snippet: After a debut collection that was a critical flop last fall, Kanye West resumed his fashion career in Paris on Tuesday night, with a spectacle of slinky dresses and furry peplums.
abstract: After a debut collection that was a critical flop last fall, Kanye West resumed his fashion career in Paris on Tuesday night, with a spectacle of slinky dresses and furry peplums.

headline.main: Kanye West Lets the Clothes Talk for Him
headline.kicker: On the Runway Blog | Fast Fashion
